about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • Tank M3A1 Stuart (Rank 1, USA);

  • "United States Marine Corps" decal;

  • Rasmussen's P-36A plane (Rank 1, USA);

  • 120.000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

M3A1 (USMC)

An upgraded version of the standard M3, the first US tank to see real combat in WWII.

It offers impressive overall speed and great maneuverability, allowing you to capture strategic points and reposition easily. It comes equipped with a fast-firing 37 mm cannon with great penetration power for its caliber. It also has a vertical stabilizer, which greatly improves gun stability at low speed. The M3A1 is a highly versatile light tank, with great mobility and firepower — and while its armor is indeed light, it can often withstand hits from some of the weaker guns on the battlefield.

Rasmussen's P-36A

The P-36A Hawk is a highly agile fighter developed in the 1930s.

It offers a good climb rate and speed but really excels when it comes to maneuverability, allowing you to beat the vast majority of contemporary monoplanes in a turnfight. It’s equipped with one 12.7 mm gun and one 7.62 mm gun, both of which can be fired together or independently. This particular P-36A was piloted by Phillip M. Rasmussen, who, despite having a jammed .30 cal and wearing his pajamas at the time, managed to shoot down an A6M Zero during Pearl Harbor.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Tank M3A1 Stuart (Rank 1, USA);

  • "United States Marine Corps" decal;

  • Rasmussen's P-36A plane (Rank 1, USA);

  • 120.000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

M3A1 (USMC)

An upgraded version of the standard M3, the first US tank to see real combat in WWII.

It offers impressive overall speed and great maneuverability, allowing you to capture strategic points and reposition easily. It comes equipped with a fast-firing 37 mm cannon with great penetration power for its caliber. It also has a vertical stabilizer, which greatly improves gun stability at low speed. The M3A1 is a highly versatile light tank, with great mobility and firepower — and while its armor is indeed light, it can often withstand hits from some of the weaker guns on the battlefield.

The P-36A Hawk is a highly agile fighter developed in the 1930s.

It’s equipped with one 12.7 mm gun and one 7.62 mm gun, both of which can be fired together or independently. This particular P-36A was piloted by Phillip M. Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

name: War Thunder - US Starter Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: War Thunder - US Starter Pack - $4.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy War Thunder - US Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level video card or higher and drivers: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The extremely mobile and rapid-firing M3 Stuart and the manoeuvrable Rasmussen's P-36A - both with premium bonuses, 7 days of Premium account and Silver Lions - ideal start for a new player in War Thunder!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
